title.rendered: “Latest IDF Casualties: Exposing the Fallen Heroes and Injured Soldiers in Gaza Conflict”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from an IDF spokesperson regarding the names of two IDF casualties whose families have been notified: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC22122023.171715416

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where the details and pictures of the fallen are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, a reservist in Battalion 8104, Ram Formation (179), was seriously injured in combat in the south of the Gaza Strip.

Also, a fighter in the Shaked Battalion, Givati Brigade, was seriously injured in combat in the north of the Gaza Strip. A soldier in Battalion 12, Golani Brigade, was seriously injured in combat in the south of the Gaza Strip.
The injured were evacuated for medical treatment at the hospital and their families were updated.
